committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Compensation and Employee Benefits

official_title: A bill to provide salary comparability with the Senior Executive Service for United States Attorneys, Assistant United States Attorneys, and specially appointed attorneys under 28 U.S.C. 543.

summary.text: Directs the Attorney General to fix the annual salaries of United States attorneys and other specified attorneys at rates not exceeding the basic compensation rates provided for Executive Level IV of the Executive Schedule.

titles.title: A bill to provide salary comparability with the Senior Executive Service for United States Attorneys, Assistant United States Attorneys, and specially appointed attorneys under 28 U.S.C. 543.
